Author: bir_die
Text: I mean, I doubt it’d be more than 1-2kg of a difference unless you’ve been reading it *super* crazy wrong. Which I highly doubt.   Personally, I’d get a new scale you can trust. And a 10 pound weight to double check it with. That’s what I do at least 🤷🏻‍♀️ hell, at one point I was using 2 scales. Numbahs is numbahs
